Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Chicago Ave/Austin
ShortDescription: EB 66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Augusta, Division and Central due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Division and Central, due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Forest Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Forest Park due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Forest Park due to a mechanical problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
